review: Everything needs a subscription or to be purchased. I can keep cable if that's the case. SMH.
author: Amazon Customer

review: This is a very easy to use and stable product. We have not experienced crashes in the 2 months of use. music, video and TV shows all stream very nicely. It takes a little to get used to the navigation but it's very straightforward.
author: Hogan's

review: A great addition to our home entertainment.
author: Suzanne

review: Pretty good for the price, abit slower then Amazon Fire TV but good for the 2nd TV.
author: Harry Mah

review: Excellent.I have Roku Stick and this. FIRE TV is a lot better!
author: Eduardo C. "Eduardo Carreiro"
